name: Spinyou
description:
Spinyou is engaging and simple game that provide you with couple of hours of fun!

Place yourself in the shoes of a dwarf adventurer who compeets in the tavern tournaments of spinyou!

Navigate tiny marbell through magical dwarven shields: collect coins, avoid traps and get to the center as fast as you can!

Brace yourself: trial of ice, fire and wind awaits!

Old magic hidden in dwarven runes will help you out!

Compete with other players to see who is the best spin master!

Spin yourself into the fun and twisted world of spinyou now!
